meanings.sent1: The loud music was miffing me during my study time.
meanings.sent2: Please stop tapping your pen on the desk; it's really miffing me.
meanings.sent3: It was quite miffing when my brother kept changing the TV channel while I was watching.
meanings.sent4: The constant buzzing of the mosquito was miffing my peaceful sleep.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive sound of the dripping faucet was miffing my patience.

meanings.sent1: Her constant complaints about the weather were a real miffing.
meanings.sent2: The long wait at the doctor's office caused a lot of miffing among the patients.
meanings.sent3: The miffing on his face was evident when he realized he had forgotten his keys.
meanings.sent4: The miffing in the room was palpable as everyone waited for the delayed flight.
meanings.sent5: The miffing in her voice was clear as she expressed her frustration with the situation.
